channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 14:33 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further messages.
item.description: 🟢 14:33 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 14:08 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 🔴 14:08 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 14:00 Free evacuations without significant rainfall, light rain in the afternoon. At night and in the morning fog, visibility 200 - 500 meters. South wind, 3 - 8 m/s. Air temperature at night 6 - 8 ° heat, in the afternoon 15 - 17 °.
item.description: 🟠 14:00 Free evacuations without significant rainfall, light rain in the afternoon. At night and in the morning fog, visibility 200 - 500 meters. South wind, 3 - 8 m/s. Air temperature at night 6 - 8 ° heat, in the afternoon 15 - 17 °. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
